meaning_str.bing:
n. 运动；练习；行使；演习
v. 锻炼；行使；训练；运用
网络. 习题；做操

锻炼；体育活动；（身体或脑力的）活动；运动；练习；训练；使用；应用；行使；习题；练习题；作业；演习；操练；实践；操作；任务；功课；一套动作
锻炼；运动；使用；行使；运用；施加影响；训练；锻炼；操练；练习

1.en: The aim, in part, of any warm-up to an exercise routine is to increase the body temperature gradually.
1.cn: 开始日常锻炼之前，所有热身运动的一部分目的是逐渐增加体温。

2.en: This paper is just an attempt to exercise the concept of recycling economy into the financial operation.
2.cn: 本文正是为将循环经济理念运用到金融运行中去所做的一次尝试。

3.en: "I have plenty of time to exercise, but I'm too lazy, " he said with a sheepish grin at a Japanese fast food joint.
3.cn: “我有很多时间用来运动，但是我太懒了，”在一家日式快餐连锁店他腼腆地说。

0.en: When was the last actual exercise you got?
0.cn: 你上一次真的去运动是什么时候？

1.en: Oh. Poor Daddy Pig. Well, at least I've done my exercise. Yes. For today. What do you mean? You'll have to do some more exercise tomorrow. What?
1.cn: 噢，可怜的猪爸爸.好了，至少我完成了我的运动。是的。今天的。你是什么意思？你明天必须做更多的运动。什么？

2.en: Oh. Poor Daddy Pig. Well, at least I've done my exercise. Yes. For today. What do you mean? You'll have to do some more exercise tomorrow. What?
2.cn: 噢，可怜的猪爸爸.好了，至少我完成了我的运动。是的。今天的。你是什么意思？你明天必须做更多的运动。什么？

3.en: Maybe Daddy will have more success with my old exercise bike.
3.cn: 也许爸爸会更有成效用我的旧运动自行车的话。

4.en: Maybe Daddy will have more success with my old exercise bike.
4.cn: 也许爸爸会更有成效用我的旧运动自行车的话。

5.en: Daddy, to get fit, you have to exercise every day. Oh, no.
5.cn: 爸爸，为了保持健康，你必须每天都做运动。噢，不。

6.en: Daddy, to get fit, you have to exercise every day. Oh, no.
6.cn: 爸爸，为了保持健康，你必须每天都做运动。噢，不。

7.en: Maybe I should do a bit of exercise. Yes, Daddy. And I will start tomorrow.
7.cn: 也许我是应该做点运动了。是的，爸爸。那我明天开始。

8.en: Hm. Maybe I should do a bit of exercise. Yes, Daddy. And I will start tomorrow.
8.cn: 嗯……也许我是应该做点运动了。是的，爸爸。那我明天开始.

9.en: Wow, that's a big potato. I declare this sports centre open. Fantastic. We must all exercise and eat fruit and vegetables.
9.cn: 哇，好大的一个土豆啊。我宣布这个运动中心开业！非常的不错！我们必须都运动起来，并且每天都要吃水果和蔬菜。

10.en: I'm also planning to begin an exercise regimen designed to strengthen my cardiovascular system. AKA jogging.
10.cn: 我还打算开始一种运动养生法加强我的心血管系统，也就是慢跑。

11.en: Oh, I don't know. I kind of promised myself I'd get off the computer, be more physically active. Get some exercise.
11.cn: 我说不准，我答应过自己要远离电脑，多点锻炼身体，多做些运动。

12.en: According to a recent study, simply thinking about exercise, even while sitting still, can have physical benefits.
12.cn: 最近一份研究指出哪怕你赖着不动，只要心中想着运动，就能给身体带来好处。

13.en: I'm good at eating fruit and vegetables. And exercise is important. Today you can see me open a new sports centre in town.
13.cn: 我就是经常吃水果和蔬菜的。还有坚持锻炼是很重要的。今天我的运动中心要在小镇里开业，欢迎前来。

14.en: Do you exercise? When I have to.
14.cn: 您平时锻炼吗？除非必要。

15.en: So much for Daddy Pig and his exercise.
15.cn: 猪爸爸也只是嘴上说说要锻炼。

16.en: So much for Daddy Pig and his exercise. Eh? what?
16.cn: 猪爸爸也只是嘴上说说要锻炼。怎么了？

17.en: Thank goodness. I don't have to exercise. I'm naturally fit.
17.cn: 谢天谢地，我不需要锻炼，我天生很健康。

18.en: Thank goodness. I don't have to exercise. I'm naturally fit.
18.cn: 谢天谢地，我不需要锻炼，我天生很健康。

19.en: What did you mean by it? That it was a pointless exercise.
19.cn: 那你是什么意思？指这个提议是在做无用功。
